channel.title: Need teleport & command help!
channel.description:
Okay everybody, these problem may seem easy to you guys but I haven't the slightest how to do them. I am quite new at coding and i'm trying so please be patient if you're trying to help
Firstly, I'd like to make a " PK" teleport. I set up the textHandler etc. I want it like when you click it, a choice comes up like when talking to an npc saying Edgeville Varrock Mage Bank
and when you click one of the options it directs you. Whever I try these ones I get so confused so i figured to ask for some help.
Next I wanted to make like a command ::lockexp for low level pures and etc. If anybody knows how and could tell me i'd be very grateful Thanks. :confused:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2009, 11:15:28 pm[/size][hr]Loal it takes like half an hour for a solution on my posts

item.title: Need teleport & command help!
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

Okay everybody, these problem may seem easy to you guys but I haven’t the slightest how to do them. I am quite new at coding and i’m trying so please be patient if you’re trying to help

Firstly, I’d like to make a " PK" teleport.
I set up the textHandler etc.
I want it like when you click it, a choice comes up like when talking to an npc saying
Edgeville
Varrock
Mage Bank

and when you click one of the options it directs you. Whever I try these ones I get so confused so i figured to ask for some help.

Next I wanted to make like a command ::lockexp for low level pures and etc. If anybody knows how and could tell me i’d be very grateful
Thanks. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2009, 11:15:28 pm[/size][hr]Loal it takes like half an hour for a solution on my posts
